event.title: Informatica Online Training Demo - Intellipaat
event.description:
Intellipaat is organizing a free demo for Informatica online Training ,This demo is for the Informatica training in Bangalore helps you master various aspects of Informatica like installation, configuration and administration, and learn how to work, test, and monitor critical data with audit able, automated, and scalable approach, and deploy Informatica workflow, repository management and more.

What you will learn in this Informatica Training Course?
Informatica architecture and Power-center
Deploying Power-center for handling jobs and tasks
Informatica Admin Console
Concept of Informatica performance tuning
Functionalities of the Repository Management tool
SCD, XML processing, partitioning, and constraints
ETL best practices using Informatica
Deploying Informatica Admin Console

Who should take up this Informatica certification course?
ETL and SQL Developers and Business Intelligence Professionals
Database and Mainframe Professionals and Project Managers

Before joining the event, you should know the basics of Informatica
Free Resources :
Informatica interview questions
Iinformatica tool
event.address: Ground floor, IndiQube Office, AMR Tech Park, Bommanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068
